name: EXECUTIVE BUSINESS SOLUTIONS LLC
sampleDescriptions: Sale of night vision goggles to the Armed Forces of Ukraine as part of U.S. Government military aid packages.
Procurement of night vision goggles (NVGs) and intelligence tools for training for the Armed Forces of Ukraine through the Department of Defense's bilateral assistance programs.
